text: A Nightmare on Elm Street is a 1984 American slasher movie. It was directed by Wes Craven and released to movie theaters by Warner Bros. It is about five teenagers who are followed in their dreams by the ghost of serial killer Freddy Krueger, played by Robert Englund. It also stars John Saxon as Lt. Donald Thompson. Actor Johnny Depp had his first movie role in A Nightmare on Elm Street. It is the first in the A Nightmare on Elm Street movie series. The next movie in the series is A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1984 horror movies Category:1980s ghost movies Category:1980s serial killer movies Category:1980s teen movies Category:A Nightmare on Elm Street movies Category:American ghost movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:American teen horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about suburbia Category:Movies about child abuse Category:Movies about nightmares Category:Slasher movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Wes Craven Category:Movies set in Ohio
title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
